ygData.subject: Re: Cross-class research?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is no cross class learning of spells, unfortunatly.  A wizard can only learn the spells of destruction... a necromancer.. only the spells of death
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Ed Coyle" <ecoyle@...>
>
> I've heard rumors that it's possible for a wizard, through research, to
> learn spells that would otherwise be available only to other classes. For
> example, I am hoping this is the case with my Wizard, I want to learn SoW
> desperately (don't we all?).
>
> SOE needs to do a better job of explaining research. ;)

There is no cross class learning of spells, unfortunatly. A wizard can only
learn the spells of destruction... a necromancer.. only the spells of death
and decay... and so on.

There are rumors, that there are spells that each of the mage classes get
that ARE the same. But each must still research them differently to get
those spells.

-Spyke Pha'al
